column3: Sukegei has been abandoned by his favorite sheep.
Use the blowgun to shoot the lost lamb from the designated location.
Deliver the lost lamb to Sukegei.
Don't suppose you have time to chase after a sheep do you? My most cowardly one just ran off after hearing a nearby beast's roar.
She is so timid she is likely to run away if you try to approach her normally.
Take this blowgun and these darts that I've laced with a sedative. One hit and she will be out in an instant. She ran off somewhere to the west. Best of luck!
Use that blowgun I gave you to put my sheep to sleep. She ran off somewhere to the west. Best of luck!
The lost lamb is wary of your presence.
You are going to need to put her to sleep first if you are to have any chance of catching her.
Did you manage to catch my sheep?
Oh, thank you! You had me worried sick you did, deary.
This job means everything to me. It truly does.
I was just a lonely orphan with nowhere to call my own when the Mol took me in. I said I would look after our sheep in an attempt to show my gratitude.
My heart nearly stopped when this little one ran away. Sheep are the cornerstone of our tribe's way of life.
I fear I will never be able to truly express my thanks to you, but know I am grateful.
